page.title: 06Village Eisteddfod
page.content: Marden joins with other Herefordshire villages and takes part in an inter-village Eisteddfod. Marden's position, in the Welsh Marches ensures that elements of Welsh culture permeate the local traditions. The Eisteddfod is a community cultural and competitive occasion. It is based on the three villages of Bodenham, Sutton St. Nicholas and Marden, though any Herefordshire village inhabitants may participate. Handicrafts, Music and Literary competitions take place alongside Folk-dancing and various demonstrations. The whole event occupies two week-ends in November and small prizes are presented to the individuals and groups in the traditional Eisteddfod purses. Cups and trophies are given to outstanding achievements.
